info: To test connect the set message to convert the json

name: Convert to json
func:
var data_extend ={ 
//use order the data and make the key as short as possible to maximised transmition of data
	timestamp : msg.payload.ts, 
    lat : msg.payload.la,
    lon : msg.payload.lo,
    ph_calibrated : msg.payload.ph,
    ec_calibrated : msg.payload.ec,
    OD : msg.payload.od,
    SAT : msg.payload.sa,
    temp : msg.payload.tp,
    speed : msg.payload.sp,
    TempO : msg.payload.tO,
	ec_high_calib_value: msg.payload.e1,
	ec_high_value: msg.payload.e2,
	ec_low_calib_value: msg.payload.e3,
	ec_low_value: msg.payload.e4,
	useCalibrationValueEc: msg.payload.ue,
	useCalibrationPh: msg.payload.up,
	ph4_value: msg.payload.p4,
	ph7_value: msg.payload.p7
}
msg.payload = data_extend;
return msg
